trans-unit.source: Manages the user interface (UI) for a smart tag panel.
This class cannot be inherited.
You can control the display of your designer's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class.
<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> provides a straightforward interface for displaying the items for each component, including the following methods and events:
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods display and hide the items for a component.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event indicates when the UI changes for a component.
Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> to manage the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> collections associated with your component.
Occurs when a request is made to show or hide a smart tag panel.
The following table lists the set of specialized classes associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
Specialized type
Description
Adds information specific to smart tag panel management.
This class is specialized from <xref:System.EventArgs>.
Connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> with its handler.
Denotes whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"></xref> class.
Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> in an unusable state.

After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> was occupying.

For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>.
Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> object's `Finalize` method.
Hides the smart tag panel for a component.
If the smart tag panel is currently being displayed, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method will hide it.

This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Hide> as the event type.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
The component whose smart tag panel should be hidden.
Updates the smart tag panel.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.Refresh%2A> method updates the internal `DesignerAction`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>, as well as the smart tag panel.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to refresh.
Indicates whether to automatically show the smart tag panel.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to automatically show.
`true` to automatically show the smart tag panel; otherwise, `false`.
Displays the smart tag panel for a component.
If the smart tag panel is currently hidden, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> method will display the panel.

This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, stipulating <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType.Show> as the event type.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> methods are implemented only to raise their corresponding events.
The actual functionality is found in the handlers for these events, which are part of the design-time environment.
The component whose smart tag panel should be displayed.
